== Testing Ubuntu on an IBM Thinkpad T43, model number 1871 ==

=== Table of Contents ===

See also LaptopTestingTeam/ThinkpadT43 for all the models being tested.

* contact - MatthewEast.

=== Specifications ===

* Intel Pentium M 1.86 GHz
* 512MB RAM
* 40GB Hard Disk
* IRQ 11	Intel(R) 82801FB/FBM SMBus Controller - 266A
* IRQ 12	IBM Think''''''Pad Ultra''''''Nav Pointing Device
* IRQ 13	Numeric data processor
* IRQ 14	Primary IDE Channel
* IRQ 15	Secondary IDE Channel
* IRQ 16	Mobile Intel(R) 915GM/GMS,910GML Express Chipset Family
* IRQ 16	Intel(R) 82801FB/FBM USB Universal Host Controller - 2658
* IRQ 16	Texas Instruments PCI-1510 Card''''''Bus Controller
* IRQ 17	Intel(R) 82801FB/FBM USB Universal Host Controller - 2659
* IRQ 18	Intel(R) 82801FB/FBM USB Universal Host Controller - 265A
* IRQ 19	Intel(R) 82801FB/FBM USB Universal Host Controller - 265B
* IRQ 19	Intel(R) 82801FB/FBM USB2 Enhanced Host Controller - 265C
* IRQ 20	Intel(R) 82801FB/FBM PCI Express Root Port - 2660
* IRQ 21	Intel(R) PRO/Wireless 2915ABG Network Connection
* IRQ 22	Intel(R) 82801FB/FBM PCI Express Root Port - 2664
* IRQ 22	SoundMAX Integrated Digital Audio
* IRQ 23	IBM Integrated 56K Modem
* Toys:
** Fingerprint Scanner
** Harddrive shock protection
** Bluetooth

=== Current Problems ===

This section will describe the current problems I've had with running Ubuntu Unstable (Breezy Badger) on this laptop. For more information see the individual reports.
* Installer breaks rescue partition Bug <nowiki>[[http://bugzilla.ubuntu.com/show_bug.cgi?id=13390|#13390]]</nowiki>
* Hard drive shock protection not working AFAICS
* Fingerprint reader not working
* Wireless hotkey switches both bluetooth and wifi on/off, but does not toggle them individually. bug <nowiki>[[http://bugzilla.ubuntu.com/show_bug.cgi?id=18548|#18548]]</nowiki>
